entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:44 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 07:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.5°C
Wind: NNE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 March 2023
